name: snapstory-downloader
description: Firefox extension to download Snapchat stories

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run package
scripts.package: zip -r snapstory-extension.zip manifest.json src/ icons/ README.md -x '*.DS_Store' '*/.git/*'
scripts.dev: echo 'Load extension in Firefox: about:debugging -> This Firefox -> Load Temporary Add-on -> Select manifest.json'
scripts.validate: npm run validate-manifest && npm run validate-icons
scripts.validate-icons: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const icons = ['16', '32', '48', '128']; icons.forEach(size => { if (fs.existsSync('icons/icon-' + size + '.png')) console.log('✓ icon-' + size + '.png found'); else console.error('✗ icon-' + size + '.png missing'); });"

author: SnapStory Developer
